original_title: Richmond: Flagg Place - Toot Hill Road
text:
(1)
Flagg Place, west side between Todt Hill Road and Westerntry Road, showing the Ernest Flagg Farm. The windmill appears in the center background.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
A close view of the windmill.

P. L. Sperr

original_title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
text:
Todt Hill Road, west side, between Flagg Place and Whitlock Ave. This is a set of three views of the golf links of the Richmond County Country Club, taken the same day.

July 15, 1925.
Views 1, 2, 3

P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
text:

original_title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
text:
Todt Hill Road, west side, between Flagg Place and Whitlock Ave. This is a set of three views of the golf links of the Richmond County Country Club. Views 1 and 2 were taken July 15, 1925, and view 3 on June 30, 1926.

July 15, 1925.
Views 1 and 2.
View 3: June 30, 1926.

P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
text:
Todt Hill Road, west side, between Flagg Place and Whitlock Ave. The view shows the golf links of the Richmond County Country Club.

original_title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
text:
Todt Hill Road, north of Flagg Place, showing two views of Flagg's serpentine quarry.

October 3, 1925
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr
